name: gccsa_g02_selected_medians_and_averages_census_2016
title: GCCSA-G02 Selected Medians and Averages-Census 2016

legal.licenceType: Creative Commons Attribution 2.5 Australia (CC BY 2.5 AU)

abstract:
GCCSA based data for Selected Medians and Averages, in General Community Profile (GCP), 2016 Census. The median or average was calculated in the following categories: a person???s age, a person???s income, a family???s income, total household income, mortgage repayment, rental payments, number of persons per bedroom and household size. The data is by GCCSA 2016 boundaries. Periodicity: 5-Yearly.
For more information visit the data source: http://www.abs.gov.au/census.

selectedAttributes.name: average_household_size
selectedAttributes.title: Average household size
selectedAttributes.description: Average household size is applicable to number of persons usually resident in occupied private dwellings. It includes partners, children, and co-tenants (in group households) who were temporarily absent on Census Night. A maximum of three temporary absentees can be counted in each household. It excludes 'Visitors only' and 'Other non-classifiable' households.

selectedAttributes.name: average_num_psns_per_bedroom
selectedAttributes.title: Average number of persons per bedroom
selectedAttributes.description: The average number of persons per bedroom is applicable to occupied private dwellings. It excludes 'Visitors only' and 'Other non-classifiable' households.

selectedAttributes.name: median_age_persons
selectedAttributes.title: Median age of persons
selectedAttributes.description: The median age of people, this excludes overseas visitors.

selectedAttributes.name: median_mortgage_repay_monthly
selectedAttributes.title: Median mortgage repayment monthly
selectedAttributes.description: The median mortgage repayment in dollars per week is applicable to occupied private dwellings being purchased and includes dwellings being purchased under a shared equity scheme. It excludes 'Visitors only' and 'Other non-classifiable' households.

selectedAttributes.name: median_rent_weekly
selectedAttributes.title: Median rent weekly
selectedAttributes.description: The median rental payment in dollars per week is applicable to occupied private dwellings being rented. It excludes 'Visitors only' and 'Other non-classifiable' households.

selectedAttributes.name: median_tot_fam_inc_weekly
selectedAttributes.title: Median total family income weekly
selectedAttributes.description: The median total family income in dollars per week is applicable to families in family households. It excludes families where at least one member aged 15 years and over did not state an income and families where at least one member aged 15 years and over was temporarily absent on Census Night.

selectedAttributes.name: median_tot_hhd_inc_weekly
selectedAttributes.title: Median total household income weekly
selectedAttributes.description: The median total household income in dollars per week is applicable to occupied private dwellings. It excludes households where at least one member aged 15 years and over did not state an income and households where at least one member aged 15 years and over was temporarily absent on Census Night. It excludes 'Visitors only' and 'Other non-classifiable' households.

selectedAttributes.name: median_tot_prsnl_inc_weekly
selectedAttributes.title: Median total personal income weekly
selectedAttributes.description: The median personal income in dollars per week, applicable to people aged 15 years and over.
